subtitle: Access all system features and configuration options. Click on any card to open the corresponding tool.
agent_config_desc: Configure AI agents and MCP tools for task execution. Customize agent behavior and enable/disable specific tools.
scheduled_tasks_desc: Create and manage automated recurring tasks. Set up schedules, monitor execution status, and view task history.
system_settings_desc: Configure application preferences, appearance, performance options, and other system-level settings.
system_settings_coming_soon: System settings feature is under development. Stay tuned for updates!
tools_marketplace_desc: Browse and install additional MCP tools and plugins. Extend your agent capabilities with community tools.
tools_marketplace_coming_soon: Tools marketplace is under development. We will launch it soon with amazing tools!
workflow_templates_desc: Pre-built automation workflows for common tasks. Save time with ready-to-use task templates.
workflow_templates_coming_soon: Workflow templates feature is under development. Coming soon with powerful automation!
